name: Boostmyproducts
author: Solution Internet

sections.description:
Boostmyproducts allows you to easily manage your products or services from a spreadsheet. All your products or services will be visible on your site and on google from a spreadsheet. You only have to modify the spreadsheet on Google Docs. The contents of this file can be managed manually or synchronized with a base type of external CRM or ERP products. Automatically, your site is updated and your visitors can use a user-friendly search system.
In the hour following your changes, a product page is produced on wordpress and will be referenced by google in order to easily find your products. Your products are always up-to-date.

Pricing

You can test Boostmyproducts one month for free. If you like the plugin, feel free to consult our pricing here: http://www.boostmyproducts.com/tarifs/
sections.installation:
1. Fill out the form here : https://docs.google.com/a/solution-internet.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeDro0uhmjsisAi9zC4l6eeuZQZ9ZlEE8sP9F1acUxnreYMWQ/viewform
  2. You will receive an email with your credentials
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/silic_boostmyproducts directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  5. Use the Settings->Boostmyproducts screen to configure the plugin. Set the url of webservice, your client code and your identification key.
  6. Call the url http://www.mysite.com/?silic-plugin=boostmyproducts-execute in order to generate the pages (replace “www.mysite.com” with your domain name).
